title: Going on de massive tilt. What do I do?
body: Haven't been playing as well I usually do as of late. Just been losing a lot of Ranked games, lost the last 4 in a row. i cri evritim.

replies.body: Keep playing, abuse the jungler as it's their fault.
Get another person to go on tilt with you then you cancel each others tilt out, that's how it works trust me I'm a doctor.
Omg this will totally work!!!!! Now i just need to acquire a friend!
I haven't run a ranked game in four weeks. I went from Silver 4 to Bronze 2. Lol I've won two tonight, I'm coming back
Shit man jesus! What am I complaining about lmao
It's dark back in Bronze...So Cold
Lmao only on s4. I could be back there if i dont break this tilt xD
I can't hit a charm to save myself on des tilt so I can nazi how I would carry u bby
Just spam games until you win one. Oh and try playing champs and roles you're unfamiliar with to change it up a bit.
The unfamiliar champions thing actually makes sense... I might do that... I seriously feel like I get worse with a champion the more often I play them lol....

I have been on a tilt once for 3 months.
Lucky it was all normals :')
